title: Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - Ethanol Fire Pit, Fire Bowl, Mini Personal Fireplace for Indoor & Garden - Bio Ethanol Fuel
descriptions:
Introducing the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - the perfect addition to your indoor or outdoor space! This mini personal fireplace is crafted from durable concrete in a sleek Graphite color with a stunning Marble base effect. 

Powered by clean Bio Ethanol fuel with safety flashback arrestors, this fire pit offers over 1 hour of burn time for you to enjoy. The stainless steel burn cup material, rapid cooling feature, and included extinguisher tool ensure your safety at all times.

Not only does this fire pit create a warm and cosy atmosphere, but it also doubles as a cooking station for delicious Smores and Marshmallows. The portable design allows you to bring the ambiance wherever you go, whether it's for table decor, cooking, or simply creating a relaxing atmosphere.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to elevate your space with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - a stylish and functional addition to any setting. Order yours today and experience the magic of a personal fireplace!

Transform your indoor or outdoor space into a warm and inviting retreat with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit. Crafted from durable concrete in a sleek graphite color with a marble base effect, this mini personal fireplace runs on eco-friendly Bio Ethanol fuel with safety flashback arrestors for peace of mind. 

With over 1 hour of burn time, stainless steel burn cup, rapid cooling technology, and an included extinguisher tool, safety is a top priority. The portable design allows you to easily move this tabletop fire pit from your living room to your garden, creating a cozy atmosphere wherever you go. 

Not only does this fire pit provide heat and light, but it also doubles as a cooking station for delicious treats like Smores and marshmallows. Plus, the ceramic wool insert increases burn time and efficiency for extended enjoyment. Elevate your space with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit and experience the magic of a crackling fire in style.
